name: Kaylee Armendariz
text:
I like to get take out from here but please enforce the mask ordinance. I feel uncomfortable standing at the door with people that are not wearing masks.
I was there on Saturday 10/31 when a large family walked in at the same time as me around 5:45 without wearing masks and were seated at a table.

name: Jeanette Cobb
text:
Had the vegan pizza and the bbq chicken pizza
.both yummy!

name: PhantomStranger McCalley
text: The pizza is amazing. The pizza sauce is extremely close in taste to pizza I have had in Italy! Great staff and great beer.

name: John Kingston
text: Service was slow untik it came time to play.  Drinks took far too long, we ordered 2 appetizers as our meals and one came out a full 10 minutes before the other.  I should have gone with my gut and avoided this place.  I'll not be back, and recommend avoiding it to others.

name: Chase Phillips
text: In my opinion, probably the best of the many great pizza places in Fayetteville. Pizzas are of well made, ingredients are fresh and delicious, and variety is awesome. Have enjoyed every pizza I've had here.

name: Mr. & Mrs. Rouse
text: First off I want to say my family and I are from Minnesota, so this isn't a place we visit all the time.  We started off with pretzel and chicken wings. Very good start. The first pic is a chicken and cheese colzon then a meat pizza and lastly and steak and cheese colzon.  Good food!! I would come back if it wasn't so far.

name: Amanda Banks
text: I was so impressed with my service today, and so happy to see all of the employees wearing their masks. I wish I had paid attention to their names so I could name drop, but they were all great. I can't describe how amazing my pizza smells. Can't wait to dig in!

name: Brooke Thompson
text: Delicious pizza with a really excellent crust. I love the funky chicken and it's easy to customize on their online ordering system. All the employees are really kind as well.

name: JB Shreve
text: The food is great, the service not so much. I ordered carryout by phone and when i arrived they said they never received the order. I told them the number I called and they said it wasn't their number. I redialed, the same number, and ‚Ä¶More

name: Review Aficionados
text: Heaven on earth!! Worth every penny. I wish they had a location in California.

name: Jennifer Kath
text: Very pricey for pizza. Waited until right before our food was to be served to tell us they were out of the mac n cheese my 5 year old wanted. Normally wouldn't have been a big deal, we could have changed what we ordered but after the 45 minute wait for the pizza, I wasnt about to try to change anything.

name: Doug Sudar
text: Great place to hang on the patio.  Great beer selection and pizza is over the top.  I've always had good service there too.

name: Sherry Reeves
text: Excellent Service and atmosphere! Definitely best gluten free pizza Ever! Only suggestion is plastic straws for gluten free patrons (paper straws contain gluten).

name: Kasha Flynn
text: the service was great and i love all the choices people have. they have gluten free and vegetarian, even vegan cheese!

name: Katherine Durbec
text: the food is usually pretty good but I am so tired of trying to call in an order and they put me on hold for what they say will be 20 seconds and then I end up waiting like tonight over 8 mins while listening to them take order after order. ‚Ä¶More

name: Ed Bengtson
text: Terrible take out service. I called to order pick-up. They took my order, and told me  it would be ready in 20-25 minutes. I arrived to pick up in 25 minutes, went inside and told them I had a pick up order that was called in and gave my ‚Ä¶More

name: michelle mcdonald
text: Super delicious!! Worth the drive from Tulsa ‚ò∫Ô∏è

name: Dewayne Forbs
text: Great pizza and staff is quick to fix anything on order if it‚Äôs your fault or theirs. Highly recommendable.

name: Michael Janusz
text: Great food.  Good atmosphere.  Staff amazing.

name: Jolene Armstrong
text: Great service. Staff made sure we were waited on consistently. Good food.

name: Elizabeth Keen
text: This place is my favorite! Grace handled my togo order to perfection üëå and the pizza wizards came out with positivity and made me laugh. Thanks everyone for being so cool

name: Joe Sweere
text: Great patio, great pizza, great draft beer selection. Dog friendly!

name: Rachael McKeethen
text: The pizza is good if they can follow an order and not screw it up.  7/10 times they mess up my order so bad it has to be redone or comped. Years, this has been happening for years. If you have allergies assume they are messing up your order. I'm done. And hungry.

name: Kenneth winter
text: Our friends Loved the cheeseburger, unique pizza combinations with super service

name: Chuck Wiles
text: An almost unlimited selection of toppings available. Good crust. Nice atmosphere. Folks who seem to like pizza (we compared notes on Arkansas pizza places) and good beer!  I had a prejudice based on a less than excellent visit in another state in another decade. I like this place!

name: Kenneth W. Wright Jr.
text: Great service. The food is amazing. Definitely on our list of favorite places.

name: Austin Dunning
text: Great food always. Never had a poor experience.

name: Albert Kingsbury
text: Great service but for me, their thin crust was just a bit under cooked.

name: Sharlisa Lindsey
text: Love the pizza. Love the decor. Will go back.

name: TerraMundo 360
text: Order two burgers to go and I pay over 26$ They didn‚Äôt put a single veggie on it so disappointing they just give me the meet with bread  when on the menu said that comes with tomato , onion and pickles

name: Tabatha Simmons
text: I got a pizza and a beer. Went to 5 places that said they serve alcohol on the web but did not. ( My cousin was driving me.) I also had a salad. The salad and pizza were fantastic, as well as our waitress. I recommend this place to all!!

name: Andrew Nelson
text: Cool place. Good pizza and drinks

name: Matthew Tunstill
text: Good food, not the best pizza in town but the atmosphere makes up for it

name: Linda Box
text: Had my fav, the Coco pizza and a yummy brown ale, Lazy Magnolia Southern Pecan. Our server was an extremely personable and efficient young woman with great customer service!

name: Lindsey Sharp
text: Vegan option was not the best. Waiter was rude and rushed us to order and slammed chairs around us.

name: Felicia Frye-Claussen
text: Good food. It was a little expensive though especially if you're taking kids.

name: Tori Isham
text: Locally owned business with a cool vibe.  Fresh ingredients on the pizzas, lots of options including vegan and gluten free.  Catering menu is always a hit with the office.

name: The 17 Year Cicada
text: Mostly average customer service but the selection and good tasting food keeps me coming back. Id recommend it! *Thumbs Up*

name: Tarsa Davis
text: Best pizza in NWA as far as I'm concerned

name: Leon Nicholson
text: One of the top 3 pizza places in Fayetteville.  They have a great patio and a cool bar.  Visit soon - you won't be sorry.

name: Daniel Coy
text: Just as any place when first going they tend to feel like they lose interest and food becomes bland and boring. I feel this place is on its way downhill. Now don't get me wrong the pizza is good but not like it used to be for me. I'll say ‚Ä¶More

name: Berry Bracket
text: Would have given it 5 stars if our food wasn‚Äôt cold. Not sure why restaurants offer delivery if they‚Äôre incapable of delivering hot food. And sorry to the driver who we did not tip because after taxes and fees our $19 order ended up costing ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew Butler
text: Holy shiitake!]

name: Cinder LearnAmove
text: Very good pizza!

name: Brian Hirschy
text: Good people. Good pie. A bit pricey, though! Still worth checking out! Give them a try if you're in the area.

name: Mandy Boney
text: The BEST pizza EVER! Do yourself a favor and go to Mellow Mushroom! You won't be disappointed. We always get the House Special Pizza and Bruschetta for an appetizer! Yummmm!

name: Barry Coates
text: The service was awesome and the pizza was as good as the other mellow mushrooms we've been to.

name: Marsea Lopez
text: My boyfriend and I used to go to Mellow Mushroom all the time, we hadn‚Äôt been in a while and decided to pick this for dinner tonight and sadly when we got home it was very disappointing. We ordered the same thing we always order and this ‚Ä¶More

name: Edward Herrera
text: Pretty good, atmosphere is very unique and quirky. Enjoyed my service and the sandwich was pretty good.

name: Lee Parsons
text: The pizzas are always amazing. Great flavors and orginal concepts for pizzas. This is my 3rd time going this year! The only reason for 4/5 is, every time our waitresses seem like they have better things to do.

name: Michael Oien
text: Great atmosphere. Great beer selection. Absolutely love the pizza! What a treat when we come to Arkansas to visit

name: Zachary Hughes
text: Pizza is great. Fresh toppings and 3 dollar beer of the month

name: Ben Althoff
text: Not Gluten free.  Gluten free crust is cooked on shared equipment.  I called to ask if the gluten free crust was cooked on dedicated equipment and was told that they use the same sheet to cook on and those are not guaranteed.

name: Jan Lauderdale
text: Fun atmosphere, good pizza, great bartender. Happy hour specials are great!

name: Ralphie Saeed
text: Great atmosphere and prompt service made for an enjoyable experience. Hostess provided prompt seating and drink orders taken with little wait. Party members where able to enjoy venue's options for different dietary needs. Portion size was ‚Ä¶More

name: Ryan Pickel
text: Great staff that are quick and happy to help you find the food options you are gonna love. Awesome dining experience.  Will be there again.

name: Anastasia Golden
text: The food here is so good. The service was amazingly quick and the environment was great

name: Dana Nickens
text: We had a birthday lunch and i ended up being late. Told my family go ahead and order. By the time i got there the pizza was cold. IT WAS AMAZING! My family said it was even better hot. Our waitress was so cool and treated us to birthday ‚Ä¶More

name: Carmen Montgomery
text: New Year's Night visit to Mellow Mushroom for two on a 1/2 price Wednesday night. Had the Shitake pizza and the Margherita/Pesto pizza. Both excellent! Even better was the service. Our kind waitress accommodated my husband's request for hot ‚Ä¶More

name: Tara Chambless
text: Best pizza place I have ever been in!  If I could give it 10 stars, I would. I wish they would open one in western Washington.

name: Jacob Andrews
text: I always look forward to coming here when I'm passing through NWA. Every pizza knocks my socks off. Also, definitely give the pretzel bites a shot, if you are looking for an appetizer

name: Rachael Price
text: I liked this place decor, atmosphere. It is kinda pricey thou. I would still like to go back and try something else.we had a sandwich the stuff kept falling out and bread was cold and falling apart. Had potential to be great. Also had the ‚Ä¶More

name: Dylan Cardwell
text: My favorite pizza place. Great original pizza and a great selection of beer on tap.

name: Ana Ozment
text: Some of the best pizza in the area. Tons of great beers on tap, and the spinach dip will change your life. The wait staff are really cool and attentive. Sometimes the food can take a bit, especially when they're busy, but it's well worth the wait!

name: Wesley Robinson
text: Best pizza on this side of the Mississippi. Family friendly, lots of props and art to look at, have crayons to keep kids busy. Super delicious bread bites. Marinara is a one of a kind recipe of art.

name: WuhSawBe
text: My family‚Äôs favorite sit-down pizza joint!  Several interesting pizza flavors.  Only reason it‚Äôs not a 5-star is we‚Äôve had a few instances of slow service and a few order issues.  Still, the good outweighs the one or two bad...

name: Paula Carlson
text: Good flavor.  This wa a sausahe fest calzone.  Sorry I forgot to take the picture before I ate it.  It was good.  Service a little lacking, and no coffee

name: Perry Calvert
text: Good pizza, best part that I like about this place is the crust!

name: J Finley
text: Loved the food and service. Paper straws were hard to drink through.  But they do have plastic.

name: Jessica Presley
text: I love Mellow Mushroom's dough and their calzones are great. They have great drink and appetizer deals during happy hour. I feel the food is sometimes inconsistent, but still good. Also, every now and then the wait takes forever. Longer than seems necessary,  even for freshly made pizzas.

name: James Ramey
text: Very good pizza. Have a lot of variety. Good service.

name: Landon Grigg
text: Cool place, good pies. Great beer, wonderful service

name: Nacho Nunez
text: No caption needed. Do yourself a favor and come try out this BOMB pizza.

name: Karen Kessell
text: Awesome!

name: Darrin Reed
text: The pizza was excellent, the service was very good, and I got my food very quickly.

name: Steve Dula
text: Great pizza

name: D Par
text: We ordered several items as this was our first time and we wanted to explore the menu. First off, the kids meal was good quality Mac n cheese, but no where near a sufficient amount for the price. The "apple slices side" is 3 slices of ‚Ä¶More

name: Kodie Patrick
text: Great food and friendly staff. üëç

name: Tiffany Rose
text: Magically delicious! Super cool vibes!

name: David Su
text: The resturant's kinda hidden away from the main road but it's worth the visit. The funky decor and music give it a laid-back vibe and the staff are friendly and know the menu well.

name: Brad Gemeinhart
text: Very good pizza and excellent service

name: Jessica Henderson
text: Great atmosphere and food

name: Cassie Reaves
text: The food was great!! Environment was really cool. Staff was friendly.

name: Randa Caja
text: Excellent service and wonderful food

name: Lou Ann Nance
text: Really good gluten free pizza, very enjoyable time

name: Ant G
text: Great pizza, good beer. Love the happy hour!

name: Ben Johnson
text: Since visiting, I've had a recurring dream that I'm enjoying their mushroom pizza, only to wake up and realize you don't deliver in Tulsa.

name: Amy Berry
text: Great as usual!

name: Roger Holley
text: Terrible staff very rude

name: Amanda Jones
text: Great pizza fun environment.

name: Brad Dutton
text: Great patio, pizzas, and service

name: WappaMan 1
text: Fantastic!

name: Lisa McDonald
text: Great pizza! We first were introduced to this in Mobile AL. It is great here too!

name: Christian Falzone
text: Vegan friendly. Fast and tasty. Great service.

name: D Manriquez
text: Food was good, service was alright. My wife and I were seated in between a group event that was their prior to us  arriving and our server didn't come out to tend to us as often as we would have liked overall this is a good place for a date night just not 100% set on 5 stars yet.

name: B.L. Roper
text: I LOVE MM! The atmosphere is fun. They have a great selection of drinks, bottled, tap, and cocktails. The servers are always friendly. The hummus is awesome! They make great vegan pizzas and I look forward to trying out their gluten free options when I come home for a visit!

name: Katy Ginder
text: Great tasting pizza crust and love the new thin crust option. They have great salads, sandwiches and soup. We started coming here for the craft beer selection. Taps rotate frequently to keep up with the latest offerings. They also offer craft cocktails and wine. Service is excellent and there is a nice patio for outside dining.

name: Brian Raborn
text: Awesome pizza place, great decorations and service. My wife enjoyed the gluten free pizza. Our new go to pizza spot.

name: Margaret Hettinger
text: Great food. Service could have been better.

name: Misty McMorrow
text: Great food, & fun atmosphere- I will go there again!

name: Megan Forguson
text: Absolutely delicious!! My 6 year old, who rarely eats anything out of the norm, asked for more!

name: Audra Lowery
text: Great pizza and even better service. Our waitress was perfect. She kept our drinks filled, talked enough for us to feel comfortable, but didn't hover. The Holy Shiitake Pie was delicious. It is sad that we don't have one in Rogers anymore, but I am happy there is an even better one this close.

name: Ryan Vaughan
text: Awesome staff, great food, vegan options and a wonderful relaxed atmosphere üòä

name: Brooke Pritchard
text: Food was great and so was the service but expect a long wait for food.

name: Casey Cusick
text: This place is absolutely amazing. The food is hands down the best. Amazing friendly service and out of this world decorations. Plus we fed a family of 5 for a little over $30! I'm in love with Magic Mushroom.

name: Matthew Williams
text: One of the best pizzas in town!

name: Stephen Smith
text: One of the best pizza places in our area. Great beer. Wonderful service.

name: Jerry Hodges
text: Great food.  Alexis was a great server.

name: Kristin C
text: A family member has food allergy. We thought to give them a try based on the restaurant chains' high marks in the allergy community. I called prior to us visiting and the owner (Kevin) was on site and available to speak about if they'd be ‚Ä¶More

name: Derrica Conway
text: I still like it even though I cant get broccoli on my pizza. The crust is good and the ingredients are always fresh. Cant go wrong with any of the pizza choices here

name: Colton Breving
text: Great food, good service. Music was a bit loud and a bit too hype, but I guess it is a college town

name: David Flannery
text: Great pizza, cool vibes and I literally took a crayon to the face to protect the beer cheese sauce from a wayward child - so, so good. ‚Ä¶More

name: Diemtrang Norindr
text: My kids love there pizza good price.

name: Krystal A M
text: I'm new to the area and decided to give this place a try. When I go out for dinner I expect quality because I'm trusting the staff will be friendly and polite. The host lady made a horrible impression & seated us way in the back. Didn't get ‚Ä¶More

name: zoo keeper
text: its a really neat place.  the food  and service was good.

name: Marius Malek
text: Great food. Slow service but friendly

name: Judy Pergeson
text: It was great food and service.

name: Jeremy Williams
text: Excellent food. Quite a few "hippie, gluten free, grass fed, organic, no antibiotics" options. Fairly pricey, though. Nice atmosphere. Dumpster is a little too close to comfort to the patio though.

name: Sarah Erb
text: the staff and the food are always amazing...will really work with you but just laid back enough to make it enjoyable!  great lunch specials!

name: Daniel Mero
text: Great pizza and appetizers. Would recommend the holy shitake pie, the spinach artichoke dip, and the mushroom soup

name: Keith Sexton
text: Great food and decent prices for premium pizza/salad. Sometimes the service is lacking a bit but I feel like maybe that should be expected at a stoner pizza joint, lol. Do not expect to get in and out quickly

name: Leah Bradshaw
text: Great pizza! They have a vegan options too!

name: Larry Ford
text: Great beer selection and food options

name: Grant Ginder
text: One of the few restaurants in NWA on Untapped- great variety of craft beer.  Has a nice large patio, open in the warmer season.  The service is hit or miss depending on the staff that day.  Great variety of unique pizzas.  This location ‚Ä¶More

name: Kevin Butler
text: I previously posted a lower rating because Mellow Mushroom removed the Red Skin Potato Pie from the menu, which is the best pizza ever. We've since been informed that, while it's not on the menu, they can still make it. We've had it several ‚Ä¶More

name: voodoo child
text: Had a great time. The service and food was good.  Big pizzas!

name: Logan Thomas
text: The food is so seriously delicious! It's a bit of a wait, but I'm never disappointed!

name: Ryan Amthauer
text: Visited here with a group of friends and they were very accommodating. The server pulled additional tables together and was always available to refill our glasses and see how we were doing. The pizza here is always good and the beer ‚Ä¶More

name: John Scott
text: My friend works there

name: Hunter Broyles
text: Love the decor, and this place has some awesome pizza. ( If you're not a crust fan get the thin. I like both.) If you want an appetizer I suggest the spinach artichoke dip, because It's a personal favorite. Staff is very friendly and service is normally fast.

name: Rebecca Fleck
text: Love their crust! My face! Good pizza toppings as well!

name: Tim Ball
text: Quality of food was great and service was excellent.

name: Jerry Morales
text: I didn‚Äôt care for the cheese. I actually think Casey General Store‚Äôs pizza has better mozzarella cheese. Other than that, the atmosphere was really cool and the service was great.

name: Clifford Follett
text: Mmm good pizza

name: kathlyn rinks
text: Excellent service and delicious food!

name: Kat Worley
text: Great food, awsome staff, all around great atmosphere!!

name: Dee Roberts
text: Want something different and yummy!!! This place has got it all!

name: Richard Ouderkirk
text: I've had better but the service was good

name: jordan rouse
text: We're on a very long road trip with 3 kids when our 3yo started freaking out, I asked if she was hungry and what she wanted she said pizza, so I looked ahead and found this great place, great atmosphere, staff were all nice and food is amazing, pizza, wings, pretzels!

name: MissCrystal Artlip
text: In 2017 they said they were coming out with gluten free bread for sandwiches and burgers. But this location only carries gluten free pizza crust for a personal pizza. Super dissapointed.

name: Taylor R
text: It's alright. Maybe like a 5.6 on a scale to 10. The red sauce is pretty flavorless. I'd suggest the BBQ pizza or the buffalo. It did the job but not something I'd write home about.

name: Jazlynn Wisener
text: Always enjoy the food at Mellow Mushroom. It is out go-to place for dine in pizza. However, it can get loud when it is crowded. They have great vegetarian choices, as well as non-vegetarian. My husband and I always order a half vegetarian , half non-vegetarian pizza and it always comes out perfect.

name: Justin
text: Great place to eat super friendly

name: Randy Adams
text: Everything was absolutely perfect! Our pizzas tasted beyond excellent, the bartender (Sarah) was quick with all of our drinks, and our server (Bailey) was kind and one of the best servers I have ever had. My first trip to Mellow Mushroom was beyond impressive, and I look forward to my next visit.

name: Kelly Webb
text: Absolutely amazing food and service! I came in at 11:30 and was immediately assisted. The atmosphere was perfect for a weekday work lunch. Order the mushroom soup and you won't be disappointed! Just amazing!

name: Grant Horsey
text: I placed an order thru bite squad, I wanted a pepperoni and jalapeno pizza.. I accident chose peperochini.... didnt even know that was a thing... banana peppers? Difference? But I called them b4 bite squad and they were willing to make me what I wanted. Thanks so much üëçüòç!

name: Vincent Robertson
text: You could skip the butter on my crust next time, but still a decent pizza and a good salad. $6 for a draft is high. Too high.

name: Ronald Grigg-McDonald
text: Very good food.

name: Diane Aday
text: Great food and service with a fun atmosphere!

name: Justin Lange
text: Great pizza for a decent price with lots of specialty pizzas. Nice full bar that has a fun drink menu.

name: Steven Johnson
text: Theres a reason why we drive from van Buren to Fayetteville just to eat here, best pizza around for sure!! Great beer choices also.

name: Lennia Daulton
text: My husband and I normally love this place. One of the few restaurants that carry gluten free and vegan products. On Mother's day, we decided to go out to give me (Mom) a break from cooking. We even made reservations. We had 7 people in our ‚Ä¶More

name: Kristyl Lindbery
text: Love this place real funky and a throwback to the 60s but the food is great and every time I've been there the servers have been wonderful.

name: Justin Hollomon
text: Really good food and friendly service.

name: Chris Neighbors
text: Great food and good service

name: Marsha King
text: Fun place to enjoy pizza. Apparently I'm not the only one who likes this place; can be rather busy at times.

name: Marquis Caston
text: Calzones were good. Service was better

name: Paul Whitehorn
text: Pizza was luk warm

name: K J
text: Fantastic service, tasty Drunken Fun Guys, and delicious pizza. Can‚Äôt be topped. A+.

name: robert w phillips
text: Great pizza and friendly service... easy in and out with plenty of nice parking.üëçüëç

name: Sandy Cothran
text: Came here with family just visiting the area. The  pizza was good but the service was lacking. The guy that served us barely checked on us.

name: Angie Owen
text: Awesome! Great pizza and atmosphere.

name: Diane Lentz
text: The Thai Dye Pie was excellent. Couldn't give 5 stars because the restaurant was freezing.

name: Tony G
text: Ok pizza...Not amazing, but worth the visit

name: Timothy Davis
text: Not what I expected.  This was my first time buying a pizza here, so I started with a basic large pepperoni. While the size of the pizza was good, the quality was not what I expected. I was not different than any discount pizza place only ‚Ä¶More

name: Jose Rodriguez
text: Good pizza

name: Brianna Miller
text: Having pizza with vegan cheese is always the way to go. Unfortunately didn't have it when I last went because they "ran out" which shouldn't happen when it's so highly requested!

name: Rebecca Annis
text: It was good food, great family fun

name: Nana Mom
text: Very good pizza!  They even have amazing gluten free pizza which is hard to find.  I love the cool, relaxing vibe this place has and my kids love all of the funny and wonderful art all over this restaurant.

name: Jennifer Gridley
text: Service was excellent and good was even better! Our group had a chef salad, (Amazing), steak sandwich, (very good beef could use some seasoning), rib pizza was just awesome! Would recommend this place to anyone in the area! Beers were pretty amazing as well!

name: charmain harlss
text: First time to visit. Great food and service. Would have been 5 stars but one of our appetizers didn't arrive until the end of the meal. Will be back!

name: Joshua Spencer
text: It's pretty good, never had a problem going here and I've been around 8 or so times.

name: Braden Scott
text: Food is good. Prices are average. Atmosphere is really groovy.

name: Christopher Verdery
text: Ingredient list is actually extensive. The crust is almost sweet, in a good way. Cheese is amazing.

name: Tyler Galyean
text: Absolutely phenomenal pizza. Literally best pizza in Fayetteville. Make no mistakes the others try and are good but good lord the light flakey crust and supreme flavor combinations of the specialty pies will light up your night.

name: Josh Williams
text: Great gluten free options

name: Dow Wilson
text: Great atmosphere and food

name: J. B.
text: This place never disappoints!  Eclectic atmosphere and COLDEST beer around

name: Jme
text: Pizza was a little burnt today and on top of that the waitress wouldn't honor the $5 small one topping pizza even though we told her that's why we wanted to get several small pizzas instead of a large. We get our ticket and it was double what we were expecting.

name: Sherri Roberts
text: Met my son from UofA along with is wonderful date Wallace along with the rest of my family. ( Twin 4 month boys, daughter and son and daughter in law) Everything was perfect and our waitress was so wonderful and friendly. Thank you for our time with family along with an awesome meal. It was perfect!

name: Sarah Summers
text: Have not had a bad experience here. We seem to always get the same server and we've been going there for about two years. He is very nice. The wait is always reasonable considering how busy they are. The food is always hot and fresh. We ‚Ä¶More

name: John Morris
text: One of my favorite pizza places.  I love their Holy Shiitake Pizza.

name: Rachel Thompson
text: I'm a fan, they make great pizza, do be adventurous and try the local specials such as the Thai Dye & the Mellowterranean.  Both are yummy and the gluten free crust is good too!  Also the service is friendly!

name: Linda Higginson
text: Great food and service. Love atmosphere too.

name: Father Ferris
text: Great pizza experience

name: Denton Thompson
text: Love that place groovy art amazing pizza

name: Weston Parks
text: Favorite pizza in Fayetteville. I love it this place more than any other. Only downside is that it's relatively expensive. It really is delicious though. My favorite is Cosmic Karma. These people know how to make a good pizza!

name: William Powell
text: Excellent Pizza!

name: Hawley Woods
text: Good pizza,  almost always good service.  A slightly higher price point,  but the ingredients are good quality and there are lots of options.  Their crust is delicious.

name: Lincoln Williams
text: Food was wonderful and our waiter was amazing!

name: lacreta thibodeaux
text: Was not impressed with this place. Overpriced for mediocre food. Service was below average .

name: Bernard Oliver
text: Good pizza and apps! Always a good time at mellow. 5 stars for customer service here

name: Larry Robbins
text: It was great, Fresh ingredients friendly service.

name: cassie booth
text: Mellow Mushroom has been a favorite for us for over 15 years. We were so glad when Fayetteville got one a few years ago.  Our go-to is the cheese calzone with hamburger and mushroom. Delicious!  We typically start with the caprese salad. ‚Ä¶More

name: Keith Brookins
text: Always a good place to go for drinks and good pizza! It can get crowded and noisy at times, but that's a sign of good business. Every so often the dough comes out too tough or the pizza isn't as good as last time, but overall a great place for hanging out in a fun atmosphere.

name: ANGIE WILLIAMS
text: Holy shiitake pie

name: James Northup
text: Great service. Nice atmosphere. The food is incredible!

name: Robbie McMillan
text: Service was amazing, and my pizza was great! The atmosphere is so 70's. Really awesome.

name: Daniel Culver
text: Phenomenal pizza and fabulous calzones.

They are effective though.
